content:
Things I know 
 Ursula Nafula 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is a manyata. 
 
 It is my home. 
 
 
 
 My home is in Turkana 
 
 County. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is a camel. In Turkana 
 
 County people kep many 
 
 diferent animals. But the 
 
 camel is very important. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 These are my teachers. I 
 
 like going to schol. 
 
 
 
 My schol is caled Lolupe 
 
 Primary Schol. I like my 
 
 Art teacher very much. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is a ship. Ships are 
 
 big. 
 
 
 
 They are used to transport 
 
 people and gods on 
 
 water. If I go to Mombasa, I 
 
 can se a ship. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is a bed. I like the bed 
 
 that my father made for 
 
 me. 
 
 
 
 I share it with my younger 
 
 brother. It is comfortable. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is a cock. At home, we 
 
 have two cocks. 
 
 
 
 We also have many 
 
 chickens. The chickens lay 
 
 many egs. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is a mouse. Mice are 
 
 dangerous animals. 
 
 They eat fod. 
 
 
 
 They also destroy clothes. 
 
 They can cause disease. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is a dog. Dogs are 
 
 domestic animals. 
 
 
 
 Our dog is caled Da. He 
 
 barks a lot. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is an umbrela. My 
 
 parents have a big 
 
 umbrela. 
 
 
 
 It has red, blue, orange and 
 
 gren colours. When it 
 
 rains, we use an umbrela 
 
 so we do not get wet. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I am in clas two and I know many things. I want to know many more. 
 
 What I do not know, I ask my parents or my teacher. 
 
 
 10
